body: He really should've contacted the police and gotten those fuckers locked up

Wow, I'm actually surprised, for once my pp didn't act up, I read all genres and even with some "sad" shit I still do the deed cuz pp is in charge, this time I even read this 3 times and nothing, I don't think that is cuz this is bad, but I, for once was focused 100% on the "story", I guess for the first time I got so angry at a hentai that pp didn't get up...at least Ryuma didn't lose this time, if he didn't beat them up there is no way they were going to just let them leave, they would keep Shion as their slave or something and Ryuma would be beaten up in a corner, crying, my boy surely destroyed them, good for him I guess, nice story, would make a decent series.

Pg 23: She's all cummed over. Pg 24: The guys says as he raped her(She screamed "Oww oww, it hurts, take it out") Ryuuma's angry and jumps over the guy(inferior right corner). I'm commented pretty late since i just want to say my opinion to this doujin, I like the art ,the protag and heroine since it's a gender bender genre it's one of those hard to comprehend how that works. Anyway at the first half the swapping medicine didn't mentioned getting pregnant at first so my brain will comply that she won't get pregnant by the rape but still traumatic experience by rape is still extremely bad taste tbh.

I occasionally like NTR doujins, but this just left a bad taste in my mouth.
The guy wasn't a cuck or a spineless retard, he was a pretty good guy and his waifu got snatched from him and actually fully non-itactuallyfeelsgoodsoI'masexlovingcheatingslutnow raped.
I actually absolutely despise rape doujins where the 'girl' doesn't like it from beginning to end...
That ‘bad’ rape and ntr ruined the whole thing and gender bend tag is wasted in this kind of story..gomen author-san but this is how my vanilla mind works

It seems that most people here misunderstood the story, the last 3 pages where it shows Shion getting rape, he's just narrating what happened to his aniki while he was searching for him, he fought the 2 by himself, the sex scene was supposed to be when he was looking for Shion, he wasn't forced to watch Shion get raped, just how bad are you guys at understanding a simple doujin lol, read carefullynext time and try to understand what you're reading, he even claimed that he gets in trouble to satisfy himself, he can probably fight for himself but he probably just wants to see Shion fight to satisfy himself

i love this doujinshi, it has a really good story and the ending was nice, i guess Shion will be permanently a woman now, according to page 9 "However if you become aroused, the female hormone will increase in your body which may lead to a permanent change to your body." So i guess Shion is now dependent on Ryuuma now in case more people who he defeated in the past comes after him for revenge like what happened here, Ryuuma needs to be more stronger to be able to protect his precious senpai

You guess realize that the black borders are for flashbacks right? You know that means the guy didn't sit there and watch her get raped, he actually fought them, it just didn't show that part..... he was simply it was basically him thinking about what they did to her....but he didn't just spinelessly sit there and watch.......

Guys, i see this all the time, but you gotta remember the basic Manga rule, White border = present, black border = past, Gray border usually means something fucky is going on.
